DOC.brief_summary: Study evaluate safety tolerability single ascending dos multiple ascend dos VX-509 administer healthy male female subject
DOC.brief_title: Single Multiple Dose Escalation Study VX-509 Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Part A study evaluate safety tolerability , PK , PD single ascend dos VX-509 . Part B evaluate safety tolerability , PK , PD multiple ascend dos VX-509 administer 14 day . A total 72 subject enrol : 36 subject Part A 36 subject Part B .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking male healthy , nonsmoking , nonpregnant female Able comply study procedure Male subject must agree use 2 highly effective method contraception Female subject must document nonchildbearing potential must agree use 2 highly effective method contraception No clinically significant abnormal result physical examination clinically significant range laboratory result History significant illness Illness within 5 day Day 1 Regular treatment medication Any type tobacco nicotine use History drug alcohol abuse addiction within 2 year Screening visit Positive tuberculin skin test Screening Female subject lactate plan become pregnant study period within 90 day last dose study drug
